snippet: The inhabitants of Algeria’s Kabylie mountains are finally turning against the fighters of Al Qaeda’s North Africa affiliate and helping security forces hunt them down.
abstract: Inhabitants of Algeria's rugged Kabylie mountains are finally turning against fighters of Al Qaeda's North Africa affiliate in their midst and helping security forces hunt them down, giving country its best chance yet to drive terror network from its last Algerian stronghold.
lead_paragraph: The inhabitants of Algeria’s Kabylie mountains are finally turning against the fighters of Al Qaeda’s North Africa affiliate and helping security forces hunt them down.

headline.seo: Algeria Gains Berber Help in Pushing Out Al Qaeda
headline.main: Algeria Gains Crucial Help in Fight Against Al Qaeda
headline.print_headline: Algeria Gains Crucial Help In Fight Against Al Qaeda

keywords.value: Al Qaeda in the Islamic Maghreb
